programme.title: Les inconnus du désert
programme.desc: A man traveling through a backwoods area is held hostage by a group of orphans who want him to become their father. Unfortunately, the kids have a habit of killing adults who refuse that particular honor.

programme.title: La ville du diable
programme.desc: Dare Rudd peut-il prouver qu'il est suffisamment responsable pour gagner le coeur de Judy et aussi déjouer le propriétaire du saloon véreux ?

programme.title: The Deluge
programme.desc: A massive earthquake strikes the United States, which destroys the West Coast and unleashes a massive flood that threatens to destroy the East Coast as well.

programme.title: Les huit guerriers de Shaolin
programme.desc: Le frère de Pan Fu, voleur et tueur, fait évader Wu Tin de prison. Il est engagé pour tuer les deux hommes à l'origine de la mort de Pan Fu.

programme.title: Le Père Noël à la conquête des Martiens
programme.desc: C'est l'effervescence dans l'atelier du Père Noël. Tous les elfes sont à pied d'oeuvre pour fabriquer les derniers jouets qui récompenseront tous les enfants sages de la Terre. Mais pendant ce temps, à des milliers de kilomètres du pôle Nord, un complot se prépare. Kimar et un petit groupe de Martiens, armés de pistolets paralysants, sont en route pour kidnapper le Père Noël...

programme.title: The green hornet
programme.desc: The Green Hornet is a 1940 Universal movie serial based on The Green Hornet radio series by George W. Trendle and Fran Striker. The radio program was so popular that in 1939, Trendle entered into an agreement with Universal Studios to produce two cliffhanger serials loosely adapted from the radio scripts.

programme.title: Le retour de Billy the Kid
programme.desc: After Pat Garrett kills Billy the Kid, Billy's look-alike Roy Rogers arrives and is mistaken for him. Although a murderer, Billy was on the side of the homesteaders against the large ranchers. As Billy's death is unknown, Roy gets Garrett to let him pose as Billy to continue the fight, but without the killing.

programme.title: R.O.T.O.R.
programme.desc: Robotic Officer Tactical Operation Research. A prototype robot intended for crime combat escapes from the development lab and goes on a killing rampage.

programme.title: Heldorado
programme.desc: Heldorado is an annual parade celebrating Las Vegas as a frontier town. Roy is captain of the guards at Boulder Dam. He helps celebrate the town's anniversary while capturing racketeers involved with the local casinos.

programme.title: A Fireman's Life
programme.desc: The boys live and work at the local firehouse. They get along just fine. They like to play checkers, poke fun at the sometimes live picture of the fire chief, and most of the time, all is quiet. On one of these evenings, they are ready to call it a night and go to sleep but, all of a sudden, the fire alarm reminds them of the duties that they have been called to perform. All does not go well - from getting into their uniforms, to sliding down the pole, to a steam-driven firetruck helped by a challenged horse. They do make it to the house that's on fire. The frightened people beg for help, and Tom and Jerry water-hose it. The horse tries to draw water from a nearby trough, the hose takes on a life of its own, and even the safety net doesn't work that well. A lovely maiden drops into the arms of Jerry.

programme.title: La loi du campus
programme.desc: Lassés de voir les rues de leur petite ville, jadis si tranquilles, et les couloirs de leur collège, naguère si sereins, livrés aux casseurs et aux voyous de tout poil, un groupe de lycéens se constitue en société secrète, les "Frères de justice". Christie déconseille à son petit ami, Derek, d'en prendre la tête, mais l'adolescent, intimement fasciné par la violence, passe outre. Les interventions des "Frères" se font de plus en plus violentes. Incendies et agressions se multiplient. La police s'émeut. La ville tremble. De son côté, Derek supporte fort mal de voir Victor, un garçon pacifique, courtiser la trop belle Christie...

programme.title: L'emprise du crime
programme.desc: Autrefois, Martha mit fin aux jours de sa tante, qui la tyrannisait, et laissa un innocent monter à sa place sur l'échafaud. Seul son fiancé d'alors partageait son secret. Aujourd'hui mariée à un procureur alcoolique qui connaît son passé, Martha tâche d'oublier son histoire lorsque son fiancé perdu, devenu un joueur professionnel, refait surface et la menace de tout révéler...

programme.title: Le peuple de la vase
programme.desc: After Los Angeles is invaded by an army of subterranean monsters, a small group of people must fight for survival in the deserted metropolis.

programme.title: Qui a tué l'ours en peluche
programme.desc: In New York, a disco hostess is stalked by a sexual predator and she requests help from a vice squad detective who takes a personal interest in the case.

programme.title: The green hornet
programme.desc: The Green Hornet is a 1940 Universal movie serial based on The Green Hornet radio series by George W. Trendle and Fran Striker. The radio program was so popular that in 1939, Trendle entered into an agreement with Universal Studios to produce two cliffhanger serials loosely adapted from the radio scripts.

programme.title: Heldorado
programme.desc: Heldorado is an annual parade celebrating Las Vegas as a frontier town. Roy is captain of the guards at Boulder Dam. He helps celebrate the town's anniversary while capturing racketeers involved with the local casinos.

programme.title: Ghosts on the Loose
programme.desc: Dans l'East Side new-yorkais, pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Des espions nazis, dirigés par un personnage inquiétant, ont élu domicile dans une vieille maison abandonnée, qu'ils font passer pour hantée. Ainsi planqués, ces sinistres individus organisent, en toute impunité, le sabotage de l'empire américain. Mais c'est oublier les gamins du quartier, les Bowery Boys, qui ont repéré leur manège et entendent bien contribuer, à leur manière, à l'effort de guerre national. Bientôt, la mystérieuse masure devient le théâtre d'une petite guerre. Petite, mais sans pitié...

programme.title: A Fireman's Life
programme.desc: The boys live and work at the local firehouse. They get along just fine. They like to play checkers, poke fun at the sometimes live picture of the fire chief, and most of the time, all is quiet. On one of these evenings, they are ready to call it a night and go to sleep but, all of a sudden, the fire alarm reminds them of the duties that they have been called to perform. All does not go well - from getting into their uniforms, to sliding down the pole, to a steam-driven firetruck helped by a challenged horse. They do make it to the house that's on fire. The frightened people beg for help, and Tom and Jerry water-hose it. The horse tries to draw water from a nearby trough, the hose takes on a life of its own, and even the safety net doesn't work that well. A lovely maiden drops into the arms of Jerry.

programme.title: Cyclone
programme.desc: A young woman must deliver a top-secret motorcycle to the US military after the man assigned to deliver it, her lover, is murdered by enemy agents.

programme.title: Invasion of the blood farmers
programme.desc: Somewhere in upstate New York, A secretive group of farmers are harvesting human blood for a mysterious purpose.

programme.title: La trilogie de la terreur
programme.desc: Three bizarre horror stories all of which star Karen Black in four different roles playing tormented women.
